mypage: Thanks for helping me out that time!
Big Bro, hurry up!
Geez! It's taking so long!
I want to play tag with the wolf again!
I can't help myself anymore!
Digging holes~♪　Digging holes~♪
I wonder what's for lunch today~?
Wanna dig holes with me, Big Bro?
I hate cherry tomatoes~...
Ehehe, what do you wanna play?
Here comes Misogi~!! Okay, let's start questing!
I don't use the steal technique to do anything bad!
There should be a trap around here, but I forgot where!
I'm outta healing potions! We gotta buy more!
Hehehe, I did a great job, didn't I~?
Ehh, Big Bro, you already have plans?
Stop, Squadsman Big Bro! Let's refuel before our adventure!
Ehehe, I love Gang Donuts~
Let's reclaim my soccer ball from the beast!
Let's give you a reward for working so hard today.
Big Bro, there's a trap there! Watch out, okay?
I know where most of my traps are!
If I were to lay a trap here, it would be over there!
Expeditions are a lot more fun when there's a bit of danger!
Huh, are you tired, Big Bro? Are you okay?
Ehhehe, this outfit looks cool, doesn't it?
I found this weird map in my dad's room... I'm so excited~!
Big Bro, there's treasure here for sure!
Everybody tells me I am just like my dad!
Big Bro, let's start the expedition already!
Ugh... I have a bad feeling about this...
Waaaah...! Why are there so many monsters?!
This might be a bit too many... B-Big Bro!
Uargh~! They're coming this way! Stay away! Go that way!
Big Bro! Just find me already!!
Ugh... *sob*... Big Bro, you liar...!
Both you and Dad broke the promise...! I hate you all!
B-Big Bro...?! No! Stay away!
No, I don't wanna! I won't listen to you! I can't hear you!
Eh... really...? You promise...?
